title.narrative: Youth and volunteers as agents of change in the MENA region (DRK)

description.narrative: Project period: 30 months from 01.03.2013 to 31.08.2016 Implemented in: Jordan, Yemen & Tunisia also with regional activities conducted in Jordan By: Danish Red Cross w/ Danish Red Cross Youth, Jordan Red Crescent, Yemen Red Crescent & Tunisia Red Crescent Overall objective: Strengthen civil societies in the MENA region through active participation of youth and volunteers in building democracy and in developing their local communities Immediate objective 1: Mobilise youth and strengthen their competences and engagement to participate in civil society development and national reform processes through active citizenship and volunteer driven activities that address humanitarian and social needs in local communities Immediate objective 2: Create improved organisational space for youth participation through strengthening their capacity to actively promote and develop youth volunteering in the MENA Red Crescent National Societies
